text: @PIBHomeAffairs @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @CimGOI @MIB_India @COVIDNewsByMIB @PIB_India @DDNewslive @airnewsalerts Appreciate partial relaxation from Govt & Respective Govt Depts. This will give some respite to buyers & sellers as well as positivity in ppls mind, hope more can be done, in coming day, simultaneously keeping control over the Covid19 Pandemic situation. Nevertheless Thanks
